item.title: Let’s Plot 1: Going in circles
item.description: Where to get the code and data? Rmarkdown document: https://github.com/davemcg/Let_us_plot/blob/master/001_polar_figure/polar_plot.Rmd Data: https://github.com/davemcg/Let_us_plot/blob/master/001_polar_figure/polar_values.xlsx First time making a polar plot….let’s see if ggplot2 can do it. Import data with readxl library(tidyverse) ## Warning: package 'tidyverse' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.3.4 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.7.2 ✔ stringr 1.2.0 ## ✔ readr 1.
